Adaptation Notes
  • In 1757 Garrick stripped it of its comic line and created a new hit which was performed as Isabella for another century
    • Source: Julia A. Rich, 'Isabella of Southerneâ€™s The Fatal Marriage (1694): Saint or Sinner'
